name: Anto: TLWA [ FullGame ]
description:
This is a FULL GAME and will be dipsonibile here just 1-2 days !

Hello player!

Honor me with a BEER and support this game ! You don't need to play ! :))

I present you my creation and I hope you like this game.

The concept was intended only for the mobile platform, but the hardships of life brought me here too ( Browser )!

It's a simple game with a cute character named Anto.

His dream is to become a great wizard, but to get there he has to go through some beautiful adventures.

The game contains 40 levels + a few surprise levels + 2 BOSS FIGHTS !

Game playable: 40-50 min !

Controls:

FREE DEMO !

The game contains 10 levels + a few surprise levels + BOSS FIGHT !

Click Here: PLAY DEMO

The full game is also FREE and available on GooglePlay   and Amazon App Store!
